mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sender_name AS "senderName", a.sender_address AS "senderAddress", a.sender_mobile AS "senderMobile", a.consignee_name AS "consigneeName", a.consignee_address AS "consigneeAddress", a.consignee_mobile AS "consigneeMobile", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_remarks AS "goodsRemarks", a.goods_weight AS "goodsWeight", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.price AS "price", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO express ( id, sender_name, sender_address, sender_mobile, consignee_name, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, goods_name, goods_remarks, goods_weight, code, status, order_time, price, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{senderName}, #{senderAddress}, #{senderMobile}, #{consigneeName}, #{consigneeAddress}, #{consigneeMobile}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsRemarks}, #{goodsWeight}, #{code}, #{status}, #{orderTime}, #{price}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE express SET sender_name = #{senderName}, sender_address = #{senderAddress}, sender_mobile = #{senderMobile}, consignee_name = #{consigneeName}, consignee_address = #{consigneeAddress}, consignee_mobile = #{consigneeMobile}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_remarks = #{goodsRemarks}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight}, code = #{code}, status = #{status}, order_time = #{orderTime}, price = #{price}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
